thread.title: BRIEF-India's ICICI Lombard General Insurance March Qtr PAT Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's ICICI Lombard General Insurance March Qtr PAT Rises

organizations.name: icici lombard general insurance company ltd
icici lombard general insurance march qtr pat

text:
April 25 (Reuters) - ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Ltd:
* MARCH QUARTER PROFIT AFTER TAX 2.12 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 1.80 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* MARCH QUARTER NET PREMIUM EARNED 19.07 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 15.98 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* RECOMMENDED FINAL DIVIDEND OF 2.50 RUPEES PER SHARE * MARCH QUARTER COMBINED RATIO 99.5 PERCENT VERSUS 97.1 PERCENT LAST YEAR Source text - bit.ly/2vPlTeO Further company coverage:
